Hellplague:
 
"Our hold on his mind is great, but ther is a chance, if he sees someone familiar, he may waver.  But the chances of that are slim.  He and Blacknightmare, are 'involved.'"
Hellplague giggled at her own comment.  Then she got an idea.
"Master, what if we were to clone Malice?  He would be just as powerful, and the clone would confuse the Maximals.  The clone and Malice would give us an edge to get rid of them all."

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:

send him against Maximals"
